name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Realitime US & Indian Stock Prices Toolbar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A realtime US & Indian Stock prices chrome extension toolbar with realtime prices display.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Realtime Stock Toolbar - Your Ultimate Stock Market Companion 

Stay updated with real-time stock market information for your favorite stocks, accessible from any webpage. Stock Toolbar adds a customizable toolbar at the top or bottom of your browser window, providing instant access to key data for each stock you're tracking.

Key Features:

1. Real-time Stock Information: Get live updates on stock prices, today's price change, and percentage change for your chosen stocks.
2. Winners/Gainers Preview: Optionally, view a dedicated toolbar showcasing the highest gaining stocks of the day.
3. Easy Stock Management: Add or remove your favorite stocks with just a click. It's user-friendly and intuitive.
4. Customization Options: Tailor the toolbar to your preferences. Choose between static or dynamic display modes.

How to Use:

1. Click the extension icon on your toolbar and select the stocks you want to track.
2. Customise the toolbar according to your needs.
3. Enjoy seamless access to real-time stock updates while browsing any webpage.

We're dedicated to enhancing your Stock Toolbar experience with regular updates and improvements.
